original_text: He is the God who lives for ever. He is the safe place where you can hide. His strong arms are always there, to hold you safely. He will chase away your enemies as you attack them. He says to you, “Destroy them!” He is the God who lives for ever. He is the safe place where you can hide. His strong arms are always there, to hold you safely. korean_text: 영원하신 하나님이 네 처소가 되시니 그의 영원하신 팔이 네 아래에 있도다 그가 네 앞에서 대적을 쫓으시며 멸하라 하시도다

sentences.original_text: He is the God who lives for ever
He is the safe place where you can hide
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 당신이 숨을 수 있는 안전한 곳이시다

sentences.original_text: His strong arms are always there
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 강한 팔은 항상 그곳에 있다

sentences.original_text: He will chase away your enemies
